    • 方法详细资料

      • initialize

        public boolean initialize()
        Initial all the information read from the file
        返回:
        if success, return true; if not success, return false.

      • getAllRoute

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getAllRoute()
        Get the name of all the routes
        返回:
        all route names

      • getAllTrain

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getAllTrain()
        Get the name of all the journey
        返回:
        all journey names

      • getRoute

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getRoute(java.lang.String routeName)
        Get the station list of the route
        参数:
        routeName - Name of the route to query
        返回:
        station list

      • getRouteTrain

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getRouteTrain(java.lang.String routeName)
        Get all the journeys of a route
        参数:
        routeName - Name of the route to query
        返回:
        All the journeys

      • addTrain

        public boolean addTrain(java.lang.String name)
        Add a new journey
        参数:
        name - Name of the journey to add
        返回:
        If success, return true; if not, return false.

      • nameExist

        public boolean nameExist(java.lang.String name)
        Determine whether journey with such a name already exits.
        参数:
        name - Name of the journey to query
        返回:
        If the train exits, return true; if the train does not exit,return false.

      • getTrainByName

        public Train getTrainByName(java.lang.String name)
        Get the information of the journey by name.
        参数:
        name - Name of the journey to query
        返回:
        the journey

      • removeTrain

        public boolean removeTrain(java.lang.String name)
        Delete the journey with this name
        参数:
        name - Name of the journey to delete
        返回:
        If success, return true; if not, return false.

      • allPassThroughThisStation

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> allPassThroughThisStation(java.lang.String station)
        Search all the journeys pass through this station
        参数:
        station - Name of the station to query
        返回:
        Name of all the journeys pass through this station

      • allFromFirstToSecond

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> allFromFirstToSecond(java.lang.String station1,
                                                         java.lang.String station2)
        Search all the journeys go from station1 to station2
        参数:
        station1 - First station
        station2 - Second station
        返回:
        all the journeys can go from first station to second station.

      • allThroughFirstAndSecond

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> allThroughFirstAndSecond(java.lang.String station1,
                                                             java.lang.String station2)
        Search all the journeys pass station1 and station2
        参数:
        station1 - First station
        station2 - Second station
        返回:
        all the journeys can pass first station and second station.

      • checkTimeConflict

        public java.lang.String checkTimeConflict(java.lang.String station,
                                 int time)
        Determine whether the system exits a journey that pass a certain station in a certain time
        参数:
        station - Station to query
        time - Time to query
        返回:
        If exits such a journey, return true; if not return false.

      • updateAllTrainLocation

        public void updateAllTrainLocation(int nowTime)
        Update the location of all the train and write into the file
        参数:
        nowTime - the updated time

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Override the toString() method
        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 java.lang.Object
        返回:
        Name of all trains
